page.title: 17Games Children Play
page.content:
Late last night when I was in. 24 robbers came knocking at the door. When I jumped out to let them in. This is what they said to me. Ballerina ballerina turn right round. Ballerina ballerina touch the ground. Ballerina ballerina do the splits. Ballerina ballerina do the kicks. Ballerina ballerina go up stairs. Ballerina ballerina say your prayers. Ballerina ballerina turn of the light. Ballerina ballerina spell good night.
(Then spell GOOD NIGHT. Then jump out saying good night quickly. Then it is the next persons turn.)
